Strings.String: You do not have the permissions required to install SQL Server 2014 Express LocalDB. Please contact your administrator.
An error occurred attempting to install SQL Server 2014 Express LocalDB.
The current operating system version does not support SQL Server 2014 Express LocalDB.

The current operating system does not meet Service Pack level requirements for SQL Server 2014 Express LocalDB. Install the most recent Service Pack from the Windows Service Pack and Update Center at http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/service-packs-download before continuing setup.
